ing.item: 10.75oz can condensed cream of mushroom soup; undiluted

directions.step:
Cut steak into six serving-size peices; place in a slow cooker. Combine soup mix, soup and water; pour over beef. Cover and cook on LOW for 7-8 hours or until meat is tender. Serve with mashed potatoes if desired.
Recipe by: Quick Cooking - Premiere Issue
Posted to EAT-L Digest by The Taillons <taillon@ACCESS.MOUNTAIN.NET> on Jan 24, 1998
